briefTitle: Cooking for Health Optimization With Patients
officialTitle: Cooking for Health Optimization With Patients

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 7 to 115 years of age (patients), and currently a medical trainee or professional (including for physicians, nurses, physician assistants, and dieticians)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to complete at least 2 intervention classes

primary.measure: High or Medium (Versus Low) Mediterranean Diet Adherence
primary.description: Based on 9-point Trichopoulou et al. 2003 NEJM scale (for patients, medical trainees, and providers)

secondary.description: Re-presenting to the hospital for similar presenting diagnosis (for patients)

secondary.measure: Composite Rate of All Cause-mortality, Myocardial Infarction, and Cerebrovascular Event

secondary.description: Educating patients on healthy diet and lifestyles according to 25 competency topics (for medical trainees)
Direct and indirect (for health systems caring for the patients in the trial)
